column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////While visiting Chicago
column2: the concierge at my hotel recommended Wildberry for breakfast.  When we arrived
column3: we only had a 10 minute wait which I hear is very unusual.  The food was amazing...I had the signature pancakes - I highly recommend.  I will definitely eat there again when in Chicago.  Great food
column4: friendly staff.  **Every day we walked by Wildberry
column5: there was an extremely long wait
column7: expect to wait for a bit
column8: but trust me...it is worth it.  :)
